message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $11,000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but $11,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm really interested in this product, but I can only go up to $10,500.  Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer of $10,500. I understand that it's a bit above your budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10,800. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you, and I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a high-quality product at a competitive price.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price. However, $10,800 is still a bit above what I can comfortably afford.  I'm willing to go up to $10,600. This is my final offer.  Let me know if we can reach an agreement.

Hi Bob, I understand that you're trying to be reasonable, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still not willing to go below $11,000. This product is worth a lot to me, and I need to make sure I get a fair price for it. I'm willing to compromise and meet you at $11,050. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
